verbose_text: TARGET uses ubiquitous expression of Gal80 ts to conditionally suppress a Gal4 driven transgene; at 18degreesC, Gal80 inhibits Gal4 activity and expression of the transgene, but at 27degreesC, Gal80 ts is inactive and the transgene is expressed.
evidence: TARGET uses ubiquitous expression of Gal80 ts  to conditionally suppress a Gal4-driven transgene
